1.title: Thrill Seekers

episode of.title: Bear Grylls: Extreme Survival Caught on Camera (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Bear Grylls shows us some of the planet?s most extreme survival stories taken from the angle of the survivors. Witness first-hand how they miraculously cheated death.

2.title: Work

episode of.title: Bear Grylls: Extreme Survival Caught on Camera (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Bear Grylls presents amazing clips of ultimate survivors who, against all the odds, get into trouble in the workplace, and live to tell the tale.

3.title: Snow

episode of.title: Bear Grylls: Extreme Survival Caught on Camera (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Bear Grylls presents amazing clips of extreme survivors who escape a frozen death by the narrowest of margins.

4.title: Roads

episode of.title: Bear Grylls: Extreme Survival Caught on Camera (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Bear Grylls presents unbelievable clips of extreme survivors on the world?s highways. Will your favourite clip be the same as Bear?s?

5.title: Animals

episode of.title: Bear Grylls: Extreme Survival Caught on Camera (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Bear once said that his work has taught him to have a healthy respect for things that can bite. We look at clips of people who have survived the game of man versus beast.

6.title: Air

episode of.title: Bear Grylls: Extreme Survival Caught on Camera (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Bear presents clips of ultimate survivors who survive shocking aerial accidents ? proving that what goes up must come down. He gets to pick his favourite clip ? will you agree?

7.title: Water

episode of.title: Bear Grylls: Extreme Survival Caught on Camera (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Bear presents amazing clips of extreme survivors who get into trouble in water, and live to tell the tale. At the end, he will pick his favourite clip ? but will you agree?

8.title: Forces of Nature

episode of.title: Bear Grylls: Extreme Survival Caught on Camera (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: Bear presents clips of extreme survivors who get into trouble in water, and live to tell the tale. At the end, he will pick his favourite clip ? but will you agree?

imdb.plot outline: In this brand-new series, Bear Grylls presents some of the most jaw dropping footage of great escapes and near-death experiences. In each episode, survivors share their stories, experts provide survival tips with 'how to' advice and Bear chooses his favourite clip of the episode.
imdb.title: Bear Grylls: Extreme Survival Caught on Camera
plot: In this brand-new series, Bear Grylls presents some of the most jaw dropping footage of great escapes and near-death experiences. In each episode, survivors share their stories, experts provide survival tips with 'how to' advice and Bear chooses his favourite clip of the episode.
